notes: Fire when registration form is displayed. Track abandonment by comparing with completion.
Fire immediately after successful registration. Ensure registration_method matches OAuth provider.
Track time between registration and verification for funnel analysis.
Fire when first onboarding screen is shown.
Fire after each step. Include skipped=true if user skipped the step.

event_description: User finished the entire onboarding flow
notes: Fire when user completes or exits onboarding. Calculate completion rate from completed_steps/total_steps.
Fire after project is successfully created. Track template usage for product decisions.
Fire after project deletion is complete.

event_description: User invited a collaborator to a project
notes: Fire when invitation is sent. Track collaboration adoption and permission patterns.

event_description: User uploaded a file to a project
notes: Fire after successful upload. Monitor file type distribution and storage usage.
